qualifier:
Unprotected write. Non-private method `org.apache.sshd.AgentTest.testAgentForwarding` indirectly writes to field `channel1.org.apache.sshd.client.channel.AbstractClientChannel.in` outside of synchronization.
 Reporting because this access may occur on a background thread.

Note that the prefix path channel1 has been contaminated during the execution, so the reported race on channel1.org.apache.sshd.client.channel.AbstractClientChannel.in might be a false positive.
